body.name: Sauder Select Storage Pantry cabinets, L: 29.69" x W: 16.34" x H: 70.10", White finish
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 20 mins
features: Tip restraint safety strap included because we care about you and your family
Assembled Dimensions: L: 29.69" x W: 16.34" x H: 70.10"
body.description: Need some extra storage in your life? This storage cabinet from the Sauder Select collection features four adjustable shelves and a full-width upper shelf so you can stash bins, blankets, pantry items and more. This storage cabinet with doors offers the perfect amount of style and practicality for any room in your home. Finished in a sleek White and detailed with frame and panel doors and sides, this tall cabinet is ideal for the kitchen, basement, garage, or anywhere you need a storage solution. We hope you like what you see. Sauder designers travel the world and bring back the best and latest in style, finish, and color trends. This inspiring world travel is evident in the cutting edge and innovative furniture solutions we offer to you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent assembly instructions
reviews.reviewText: This took me solo a bit under 2 hours to assemble (and that is with a toddler "helping"). The assembly instructions are very descriptive and easy to follow.Appearance wise the cabinet looks great. It is not very sturdy- as in you can feel the door shake a bit when it detaches from the magnet upon opening. Definitely easy to tip so will be securing when we move it to its final home. It comes with a securing set.Pros- great instructions, able to assemble with one person, good appearance.Cons- not super sturdy. Do not over tighten screws as the wood will split. Had one little split when I fist began.Giving it 5 stars as for the price it seems to be good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and nice looking
reviews.reviewText: At first, when I unpacked the parts, I thought it was a little flimsy. Once it was together, it was not the case. This is vary sturdy. I added a wire shelving unit to one side. This is a great storage unit. It took about 90 minutes to unpack and assemble from start to finish. I would definitely recommend this storage unit for inside. Probably will not take a lot of abuse. Very clear instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look great, very functional, but be aware they are thin and not very sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: We are very happy with these. Purchased 3 of them on Prime day at a nice price and have them set up in our basement for extra storage. Pantry, food, cleaning supplies, paper products, misc.They hold quite a bit and it has given us some great storage.They look nice.These use very thin materials and are not very sturdy, but they are fine for what they are. You have to be gentle with them and they'll be fine. I'm not sure I'd put these in a heavy use part of the house or in a kids playroom. They'd probably rip the doors right off.The shelves are sturdy though. It's just the doors and sides that are thin.Assembly was straight forward.I'd consider getting more if they pop up again around $100. I wouldn't mind paying a little more for a heavier duty version with thicker materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to build but beautiful
reviews.reviewText: So I’ll start by saying this took forever to arrive. I kept getting alerted it was coming for over a week and had been alerted to request a refund or a new item the day it showed up. Luckily it came! I was looking for pictures of the inside but couldn’t find any with BOTH doors opened. So in the instructions you MUST build the top shelf AND the middle divider shelf which isn’t shown in the product pictures as they only show one door open at either time which is misleading. I bought it just for storing random stuff for outside like sunscreen and dog cookies and our vacuum and mop and broom. We have no linen closets and a tri level house so storage is awkward for stuff like this that we need everyday but don’t want just sitting out. Luckily this *just* fit our first generation DYSON vacuum on one side and our mop broom and bucket on the other. What you see it with is the bare minimum of what must be built. You HAVE to have the top shelf and you HAVE to have the divider shelf or it won’t be stable. It also look AMAZING and we’ve got a lot of compliments on how modern and stylish it is. It’s not the sturdiest thing in the world but sturdy enough for what we are using it for. It did have extra shelves but we didn’t need them so we just stored them for later. Would be great for a pantry and works awesome as a closet for vacuum and other cleaning tools. Definitely a two person job as well. I usually build all our stuff alone and actually needed my husbands help for this. Instructions are a little complex, having 3-4 steps under each heading so make sure you read it carefully especially as not everything was labeled. Also the back is cheap cardboard and the screw covers came with what essentially are stickers so we didn’t apply them. We plan on building a seating bench by our table to match it and we will cover the screw holes up then. Love that is thin enough to not make a huge footprint but big enough to hold large items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality & easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I got this yesterday and it took about 1.5 hours to assemble it. The assembly manual was easy to follow. The quality is good. It was wobbly without the shelves. Once I put shelves and put stuff on them, it was not wobbly. The color is more like beige, not white though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Time will tell
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these and my brother put them together in about an hour. They look nice. However, the woods is very thin and feels flimsy. I don't know how long they will last, but they do offer the storage I need. One cabinet was missing a shelf when it was assembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Box was broken
reviews.reviewText: The box was broken and the top shelf was broken. Love the cabinet. Very good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great! Nice material, Sooo easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I don't know about some people's fuss about the quality of work. I like it. The finishing it nice. It is nicely polished so its smooth.This DIY was probably has the easiest instructions I've had ever. Some DIY will only give you a paper with one phone with an essay on it. I noticed it is manufactured in Thailand? Nice job on them too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don't bother if it's a pantry type you're looking for
reviews.reviewText: This product is absolute crap. The pieces are not even layered with a typical veneers, it's just spray painted one time and easily scratched. The sides are such thin material; maybe 1/8". The particle board is a poor quality and the screws don't even find purchase because once they reach the end they just keep spinning. There are no cam lock nuts or screws because the material is so cheap and thin they couldn't be bothered. The shelves themselves don't even fit properly. Hope this doesn't fall apart in 2 weeks. Dot stickers to cover screws. Just cheap. Not for kitchen use but not sturdy enough for anything but food.
